text: sillo du jibdan-i mannadeon nal-e dol-aseon jadeul-eun, geudeul-i jeojileun geos-ui ilbulo malmiam-a satan-i geudeul-eul siljogke han geos-e daleum anila. jinsillo hananimkkeseoneun geudeul-ege gwan-yong-eul bepusyeossnola. sillo hananimkkeseoneun neogeuleoi yongseohasineun bun-imyeo gwandaehi yong-inhasineun bun-ila
